notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The production of this review was supported by the METROFOOD-CZ research infrastructure project (MEYS Grant No.: LM2018100) NutRisk research program (Project No.: CZ.02.1.01/0.0/0.0/16_019/0000845), CEREBIT (Project No. CZ.02.1.01/0.0/0.0/16_025/0007397), internal grant from the budget for the implementation of the activities of the Institutional Plan of the UCT Prague in 2020 and grant No. A1_FPBT_2020_004.
